game.name: Goblin Dungeoneer
game.desc: Prepare for "hell in video game form"! Goblin Dungeoneer is a tough as nails platforming game developed by CrackedGhostGames. Traverse through 50 unique levels, leap over dangerous spike pits, dodge dangerous arrow traps, and much more! Enter the dungeon to save your starving goblin tribe! You are going to die... A lot... What kind of dungeon would this be if it wasn't dangerous? Good luck.
